name: Escape (itch) (Pislify)
description:
made in 2hours 0min 34sec as a test for a java raylib binding (it's the best one)

https://github.com/electronstudio/jaylib

instructions : 

open a terminal (or command prompt if you are a windows boomer)

run "java" or "javac"

the one that shows more text is yours

if both show an err message download java

else go [java or javac] -jar  your/path/to/the/game.jar (or double click if you are lazy)

hit enter here you go
